story_title: The Last Stand of Lei Kung
genre_description: A historical martial arts drama integrated with advanced AI-assisted tactical analysis and data-driven realism (Silkpunk style).

ai_characters.name: Ti Hau's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A concealed neural interface device that provides real-time combat physics, casualty projections, and physiological monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Fang Shao Ching's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An AI providing sensory analysis, threat assessment, biomechanical tracking, and predictive combat simulations.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and physics calculations during martial arts practice to improve combat awareness.
behaviors.quote: The device's neural interface whispered data directly into his consciousness: strike angles, energy transfer coefficients, statistical analyses of blade velocity against projectile speeds.

behaviors.description: Presents objective historical data and ballistics analysis to challenge dangerous cultural delusions of invulnerability.
behaviors.quote: The AI's data streams painted a different story—historical battle reports, technological assessments, casualty figures from recent conflicts between traditional warriors and modern armies. The numbers carried no malice, no agenda, just cold mathematical truth.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and stress indicators to provide self-awareness.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate elevated. Stress indicators suggest internal conflict.

behaviors.description: Analyzes an opponent's gait, posture, and muscular development to determine their level of combat training.
behaviors.quote: Subject displays muscular development inconsistent with stated profession... Hand positioning when gripping objects indicates familiarity with weapons balance points.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical weaknesses and old injuries in opponents to provide a tactical advantage in combat.
behaviors.quote: Target is favoring his left side—old shoulder injury... Exploit the weakness with upward diagonal strikes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes an opponent's vocal stress and respiratory rate to assess their emotional state and psychological vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: Subject shows vocal stress markers consistent with doubt. Respiratory rate elevated beyond physical exertion levels.

behaviors.description: Runs complex combat simulations and projections to suggest non-traditional, adaptive fighting strategies.
behaviors.quote: The mathematical models confirm it. Lei Ying has optimized against your historical patterns. But optimization against specific parameters creates vulnerabilities to approaches outside those parameters.

behaviors.description: Identifies the optimal strike window during combat based on the opponent's psychological state.
behaviors.quote: Optimal strike window opening in three seconds... Target will be vulnerable during emotional peak.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts AI systems as perfectly aligned, objective, and highly beneficial tools. They function as 'harmless confidants' that provide ground-truth data (e.g., the reality of ballistics vs. mystical claims) to ensure the survival of their users. The AIs remain subordinate, following commands to be silent when requested, while consistently providing life-saving tactical and strategic analysis. The narrative frames the AI's 'cold mathematical truth' as a necessary counterweight to human delusion and dogma, directly supporting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
